root.name: Emergency 2012
root.description:
A cold snap in London and Munich, Riots in Paris after a severe storm, blistering heat in Berlin, massive bush fires in Athens: The year is 2012 and the world as we know it seems to have spiraled out of control. As the head of rescue operations itâ€™s your job to ensure the safety of the population. Guide the police forces, fire brigades and specialist rescue crews to save hundreds of lives!
Take on natural disasters, terror attacks and more as you battle to regain order and bring the town back from the brink of destruction. The world is counting on you, can you handle the pressure?
